quote: I planned my whole future around Adam,' she said now, quietly. 'And now I have nothing.''No,' I told her, 'now you just don't have Adam. There's a big difference, Lissa. You just can't see it yet.
quote_letters: I PLANNED MY WHOLE FUTURE AROUND ADAM SHE SAID NOW QUIETLY AND NOW I HAVE NOTHINGNO I TOLD HER NOW YOU JUST DONT HAVE ADAM THERES A BIG DIFFERENCE LISSA YOU JUST CANT SEE IT YET
